description:
DrainMe (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99_3round.sol#3-116) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- players.push(msg.sender) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99_3round.sol#54)

DrainMe.unlockSecret() (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99_3round.sol#66-75) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- secret % 5 == 0 (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99_3round.sol#69)
